The '''Silver Wheel Reincarnation Explosion''' is a powerful technique utilised by [[Toneri Ōtsutsuki]]. 

== Usage ==
While using [[Tenseigan Chakra Mode]], Toneri focuses his chakra into one of his [[Truth-Seeking Ball]]s and grasps it in his hand to create a powerful silvery typhoon. The power of this gust is on par with [[Naruto Uzumaki]]'s [[Planetary Rasengan]] and the clash between the two techniques was enough to break through the [[Moon]]'s exterior crust.

[[id:Ledakan Reinkarnasi Roda Perak]]
[[fr:Réincarnation de l'Explosion de la Roue Argentée]]
[[pl:Ginrin Tensei Baku]]
